ygData.subject: Re: A Request and Thoughts on Rubicite Armor.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Doh, somebody needs to tell my bard to take off his mithril bp (acronymn! deal!) then. Bards can wear the mithril breastplate as well as silvered (looks
ygData.messageBody:
>
> So, we have an armor that is arguably the best magical armor that
>can be had, for more than half of the players in EQ. (Yes, Mithril and
>a few other pieces are better but are only wearable by a few, for
>example we bards cannot wear Mithril). And, it is only found in one
>place. And, it is a rare drop. What this means is that there will
>NEVER be enough ruby to go around.
>

Doh, somebody needs to tell my bard to take off his mithril bp (acronymn!
deal!) then. Bards can wear the mithril breastplate as well as silvered
(looks like steel, better than rubi) plate greaves. I dont have a spot of
rubi on me besides the bracers, and im debating trading those in for
something else i got (stats vs ac). And its not a rare drop, the mithril
and rubicite is best described as uncommon. If you have ever tried to camp
an actual rare drop, you know what im talking about.

Gendal Concorden, lvl 45 Bard of Tunare
